full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SANGS RGYAS SMAN BLA'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B(CES SANGS RGYAS SMAN BLA'I SGRUB THABS MDOR BSDUS 'KHYER BDE 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES YONGS RDZOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED CHEN PO DZA YA PAndI TA'I GSUNG GI BSKUL BA LTAR SNYOMS LAS PA BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI BKRA SHIS RGYA MTSAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG RGYAL BA BLO BZANG GRAGS PA'I BSTAN PA DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
